thread.section_title: Q&A Residential Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Overall Amazing Experience!
thread.title_full: Overall Amazing Experience! - Review of Q&A Residential Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jessicamsam
title: Overall Amazing Experience!
text:
This hotel was breathtakingly beautiful. The rooms look just as gorgeous as the pictures on their website. The staff was so friendly and accommodating. The hotel is within walking distance to many great restaurants and shops. The Bose speaker in the room was an amazing way to add some great sounding music to the room and the overall feel of the room. From check-in to check-out my experience was a 10 out of 10. Cant wait to visit again!
Room Tip: The two bedroom suite is amazing for larger parties. The Studio apartment is perfect for 2 or 3 peop... See more room tips
